# K. Douglas Cook

Of Counsel

![](https://rbelaw.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/DOUGLA1.png)



[317-636-8000](tel:317-636-8000)



317-955-7159



[email Doug](mailto:dcook@rbelaw.com)



[Download VCard](https://rbelaw.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/vcard/Douglas%20Cook.vcf)

- [Biography](https://rbelaw.com/our-team/attorneys/k-douglas-cook/#)
- [Community Activity](https://rbelaw.com/our-team/attorneys/k-douglas-cook/#)

Doug Cook began his career as an accountant in public accounting prior to completing law school in 1986. Doug has owned and operated several businesses in addition to his professional practice. Doug’s primarily legal work is in the areas of business organization and structure, mergers and acquisitions, contract review and negotiations, and general business advice. Doug has represented many business owners, physicians, physician groups, and entertainers.

- Ball State University Alumni Council, 2018 – Present
  - Executive Committee, Member
  - Treasurer
- Crooked Stick Golf Club
  - Board of Directors, 2002 – 2008
  - President, 2007 – 2008
  - Member, numerous committees
  - Committee Chairman:
    - 2005 Solheim Cup
    - 2009 USGA Senior Open
    - 2012 BMW Championship
    - 2016 BMW Championship
- United States Golf Association
  - Regional Affairs Committee, Current Member
  - Mid-Amateur Committee, Past Member
  - Certified Rules Official
- Carmel United Methodist Church, Member

#### Associations

• Indiana CPA Society

• Indiana CPA Society Ethics Committee

#### Bar and Court Admissions

• Indiana, 1986

• U.S. District Court, Southern District of Indiana

• United States Tax Court

#### Education

• Indiana University Indianapolis McKinney School of Law, JD, _Magna Cum Laude_, 1986

• Ball State University, BS, _Cum Laude,_ 1979
